fields.headline: Folksonomic Zeitgeist
fields.bodyText: This is really just another test post, to show off the Folksonomic Zeitgeist widget to the right. It's not very impressive looking at the moment, as there aren't enough entries with enough tags, and so most of the tags have only been used once. The more you use a tag, the bigger it gets. So this entry is tagged with existing tags to bootstrap the process a little. Also, the links currently point to Google, rather than the internal search engine. I'm just rebuilding that, so the links will change soon.
